metadata.title: CVE-2024-6610 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Form validation popups could capture escape key presses. Therefore,spamming form validation messages could be used to prevent users fromexiting full-screen mode. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 128 andThunderbird < 128.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
